name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Customer Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering secure and high-performance applications, with a focus on **SQL**, **Python**, **Cloud**, and **APIs**. Proficient in **Cloud Security Posture Management** and **Data Loss Prevention**, ensuring compliance with data privacy regulations and security best practices. Experienced in **Security Information and Event Management** and **Vulnerability Management** to enhance system integrity and customer trust. Adept at project management and building strong customer relations, enhancing user experience through effective technical troubleshooting.

Demonstrated expertise in developing robust solutions utilizing **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Proven ability in architecting and deploying AI/ML-integrated platforms within cloud environments like **AWS** and **Azure**, leveraging modern methodologies such as microservices and event-driven architectures, as well as implementing CI/CD pipelines. Strong background in **MLOps** practices with tools including **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, effectively aligning innovative solutions with compliance standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.
